attributes.additional_details: It also harms the envoirmental, people will take more envoirmental ways of getting there
attributes.background: It will stop drinking driving and be more envoirmental friendly. In  2016 around 10,000 people died from it.

rejection.details:
Parking is a local responsibility. You could raise the issue with local councillors who represent you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
